website_summaries.verdict: The Asics SonicSprint track running shoe will take any athlete's speed to the next level. The majority of its users have been saying nothing but good reviews about the shoe. This pertains mostly to its great value for money and the comfort it brings during their races. Very minimal issues were found on the SonicSprint, making it a reliable track and field shoe for any middle-distance runners who are serious about their performance.
pros: Most Asics SonicSprint users say that this track running shoe is very comfortable
A lot of users appreciate the shoe for its value for money
Several reviewers of the SonicSprint like the shoe's excellent durability
Some of the wearers commend the shoe being lightweight yet sturdy enough for their competitions
The majority of SonicSprint users praise the shoe's outsole for having a reliable grip
cons: A couple of users say that the shoe has hard arches, making it a bit uncomfortable
One user has mentioned that the back of the spikes was rubbing against his heels, which made it a bit bothersome during his run

customer_reviews.title: They look great, but not as flexible on the instep as ...
customer_reviews.text: For my son, but they seemed to run a hair smaller than his true size. They look great, but not as flexible on the instep as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron S

customer_reviews.title: Every 100/200 sprinter even 400 sprinter if you're fast enough ...
customer_reviews.text: Every 100/200 sprinter even 400 sprinter if you're fast enough should get these. They're not as costly as Nikes, yet lighter and still have that full length plate. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Book mama

customer_reviews.title: They are good for sprinting.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. They work well for sprinting, but the gold pealed off of the shoes the first day.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Son running 400 and 4x4. Long jump. No complaints. Delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Whisenant

customer_reviews.title: Run a little large
customer_reviews.text: Super quality and value, but the shoes run a bit large.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Pricing issue
customer_reviews.text: The pricing on this item changed drastically the day after my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: FCB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: light weight and sturdy, provides very good grip in the run.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but sizing is different
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes but the sizing was a bit off. Normally wear a 12 in normal Nike trainers but need an 11-11.5 in these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Feels like you are bare foot that there is no weight when wearing them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought 1/2 size up for my son and he loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: might be good if sized right.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, looks great but the right shoe was smaller than the left. I would guess the right was 12.5 and the left 13 and I wear size 13. The left felt absolutely great.
customer_reviews.author: gary reed

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: These run 1/2 size large so make sure to buy 1/2 smaller than normal spike size.
customer_reviews.author: Sprinter

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to state as they were a half size too ...
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to state as they were a half size too small for my son. Reordered the size 12 in white.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Wooddell

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: did not fit son at all. size indicator not even close to the correct size. sent right back.
customer_reviews.author: Bendite

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have worn it to won the third prize in 100m race,it's remarkable for me
customer_reviews.author: leonstone

customer_reviews.title: he is very happy with fit and performance
customer_reviews.text: They were for my nephew, the ones he requested. He is in field and track, he is very happy with fit and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Groves

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit tightly, especially around the heel. Hard arches, foot was sore after wearing for ten minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Cole Ebel

customer_reviews.title: an okay product..not amazing
customer_reviews.text: good for the first fit but once u start running in it...even with socks on, it gets uncomfortable quickly
customer_reviews.author: Cassandre Williams

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The back of spikes were rubbing against my heels uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kuah G.

product_meta.title: ASICS Mens Sonicsprint-M Sonicsprint-m
product_meta.description: Whether it's the 100m, 200m, or the short hurdles - the SonicSprintï¿½ is ideal for top level sprinters seeking a high performance shoe for fast times on the track. The sturdy Pebax Plate of the SonicSprintï¿½ provides a great platform for building speed from the gun. The removable 6-pin spike configuration is positioned to the exact needs of sprinters for start, push, and finish. The form- fitting upper of the SonicSprintï¿½ model features lightweight yet supportive synthetic leather for enhanced control when burning the curve. Comes with 6mm pyramid spikes and wrench.
feature_bullets: Pebax Spike Plate - Optimizes flexibility while maximizing durability.
